lines.text: [as the three little pups are watching their televisios set, of a western, that the Big Bad Dogcatcher swallowed in previous scene]
Now, don't ask us how we got the television set back!
[Droopy looks to the television & theatre visitors, as he spoke]

[a bulldog is biting his pants]
Okay, break it up, son. Joke's over, hear?

[to Snoopy and Loopy]
Now you boys can build with sticks and hay, but the Big Bad Dog Catcher is coming today! He'll huff and puff and blow your houses down, and you'll both wind up in the city dog pound!
[the Big Bad Dogcatcher has surrounded the brick dog house with various explosives, which he then lights]
if this don't work, I'm going into television!

[the explosives all blow up, leaving a huge gaping hole around the brick house, but the house itself remains intact; on the three little pups' TV, the Dogcatcher is seen on a western program they're watching]
[the Big Bad Dogcatcher is using a sledgehammer to try and break down the brick dog house's door, but it's made of steel and resistant to any damage]
Now, there's a well-built dog house, man.
